pages.title: Dragon Scale
pages.text: The Dragon Scale is the primier item to craft the Dragon Tools and the Dragon Armor. It is dropped by the Dragon

pages.title: Dragon Steak
pages.text: The Dragon Steak is a consumable meat.  The Dragon Flesh is dropped by the Dragon. Nutrition: 4, Saturation: 0.3. A cooked steak has higher values. Nutrition: 10, Saturation: 0.3.
